about: This is a file specifying the tests to skip. each test.py file (that has tests to skip) should read this json and skip accoardingly
format: tests: {test_name: {reason: 'reason for skipping', flags: optional flags}}

testing_maximum_function_depth.reason: v1 permeneantly does not support this

operators_on_ints.reason: v1 permeneantly does not support this

name_starts_with_underscore.reason: safe exec does not support variables starting with underscore ; v2 uses dict for vars so _ are ok
